meanings.definition: A runic alphabet used by Germanic tribes.
meanings.sent1: The futharcs were ancient symbols used for writing.
meanings.sent2: The historian studied the futharcs to understand ancient texts.
meanings.sent3: The children pretended to write secret messages using the futharcs.
meanings.sent4: The futharcs on the stone tablet seemed to whisper stories of the past.
meanings.sent5: The intricate futharcs were carefully carved into the wooden staff.

meanings.sent1: She carefully futharcs the message onto the ancient scroll.
meanings.sent2: The explorer decided to futharcs the mysterious stone with symbols.
meanings.sent3: He jokingly threatened to futharcs his name on the tree trunk.
meanings.sent4: Her words futharcsed a sense of mystery into the old ruins.
meanings.sent5: The artist skillfully futharcsed the intricate design onto the metal plate.

meanings.definition: The study of ancient runic writing systems.
meanings.sent1: Her passion for futharcs led her to become a renowned scholar.
meanings.sent2: The university offered a course on the history of futharcs.
meanings.sent3: The futharcs enthusiast spent hours deciphering ancient texts.
meanings.sent4: In the library, shelves were filled with books on futharcs.
meanings.sent5: The museum displayed artifacts related to the study of futharcs.
